Posts.Content: Apr 30, 2012 01:35AM rainakay wrote: Hi Green. Although I am only 21, I've had to deal with some breast issues myself in the last year, twice.Â I can tell you, push for answers. Never take "let's just treat symptoms" as an answer. You have a right to know what is going on with your body and health, and if what they are testing with isn't coming up with much, test again with something different. I have met and spoken with people that it has meant life or death for them. Keep us informed!
Posts.Title: Can I ask for a biopsy? dustyGreen dustyGreen
